accommodation.Title: Villa Suite
accommodation.Intro: This two-bedroom villa with a mezzanine level is suitable for bigger families or group. This modern designed building has a bath and shower room, a wide living room and an open roof deck for BBQ party.

accommodation.Title: Villa Jasmine
accommodation.Intro: Comprising of a combined bedroom, living, dining, kitchen area and an attached toilet, these versatile homes promises lots of many pleasant experiences in the cool Kiririom mountain.

accommodation.Title: Bungalow
accommodation.Intro: Stay in one of our specially designed bungalows and experience the invigorating fresh air and peaceful life in the pine forests of kirirom. Relax in our king size or twin-bed bungalows

accommodation.Title: Camping
accommodation.Intro: Experience a fun and safe camping under the moon light and the twinkling stars in our camping ground or book one of our luxury tents with and en-suite bathroom.

accommodation.Title: Khmer Cottage
accommodation.Intro: Experience a real Khmer traditional hut with the fresh and cool breeze. Stay in a Khmer farmer's open-style house nicely decorated with natural materials

accommodation.Title: Luxury Tent
accommodation.Intro: Luxury Tent-Stay in style and comfort in a high quality tent with the comfort of a hotel room. The tents come with a king size bed and en-suite bathroom.

accommodation.Title: Pipe Room
accommodation.Intro: A unique design to Cambodia and other Asian countries, the Pipe Rooms are affordable and cozy option. Ideal for students and couples who want to experience a creatively.

property.Title: TypeA2 (in Orchid Hills)
property.Intro: This is a luxury holiday home which has private bed room so that you can enjoy your time with your beautiful family. There are 3 bed rooms, one of those is maisonnette, dining, living, kitchen, toilet, bath tub inside the villa. You also can enjoy BBQ outside at your 600sqm spacious garden.

property.Title: TypeR/R2 (in Jasmine Hills)
property.Intro: This is the studio type holiday home which is recommended for couple or small family to enjoy simple nature life. You can set up a bed in living and we have dining, kitchen, toilet and shower, 180sqm private garden. We are willing to accept lease back program as students dormitory, then you will get some ROI with smallest amount of investment.

property.Title: TypeV (in Orchid Hills)
property.Intro: The modern design holiday home which has dining, living, kitchen. It is designed as special space for you to relax. You can choose both grand floor with your own garden and 1st floor with nice view.

property.Title: TypeT2 (in Orchid Hills)
property.Intro: The design is highly sophisticated to make natural community among the residents and it is a kind of share house which has 13 private rooms and 6 bath room. There is a spacious co-working space in the middle of building and simple kitchen as well

activity.Title: Pine View Restaurant
activity.Intro: Serves the best foods with our experienced chefs among all the pine trees.

activity.Title: Mountain Bike Rental
activity.Intro: Do you prefer riding a mountain bike to see the sights around Kirirom? You can rent the vehicles here, please ask the reception for more details.

activity.Title: Massage
activity.Intro: You can feel the traditional massage from our professional staffs on top of Kirirom mountain. Available only in vKirirom.

activity.Title: Conference Room
activity.Intro: For seminar, meeting, conference etc. Share your ideas in the mountain.

activity.Title: Shuttle Bus
activity.Intro: Resort also provides transportation service to customers with an acceptable and reasonal price rate.

activity.Title: Banquet
activity.Intro: Pine View Kitchen has around 160 seats, where you can have a big party.Buffet can also be available.

activity.Title: Bubble Soccer
activity.Intro: Bubble soccer is becoming popular around the world. Come and try the first bubble soccer in Cambodia.

activity.Title: Nine Holes Disc Golf Course
activity.Intro: Disc golf, also known as Frisbee golf, is a flying disc game, as well as a precision and accuracy sport.

activity.Title: Color Ball Fighting
activity.Intro: Let's ball fighting! How good are you at hiding, ducking and throwing a ball? Let's find it out here at vKirirom Pine Resort.

activity.Title: Bicycle Race
activity.Intro: Ready Set GO! Come with your friends and challenge them to an exciting bicycle race.

activity.Title: Go Cycling
activity.Intro: Cycling is a very popular leisure activity while in Kirirom Pine Resort. Ask our staff for a map.

activity.Title: Field Day
activity.Intro: Field Trip? Visit us at vKirirom Pine Resort and enjoy a variety of team building activities.

activity.Title: Multiple Court
activity.Intro: We have a volleyball, netball, futsal, and dodge ball.

activity.Title: Hit The Clay Pot
activity.Intro: One of Cambodia's favourite popular game is here. Blind folded with a bat and a group of directors. Will you hit the pot?

activity.Title: Drone Flying Lesson
activity.Intro: Do you want to experience being a pilot? Learn how to fly and maneuver this drone with us, available only at vKirirom Pine Resort.

activity.Title: Struck Out
activity.Intro: 9 out of 9? You won $300 in cold cash. How good is your aim? You might be our next struck out $300 winner.

activity.Title: Petanque
activity.Intro: Now it's about the time for you to try one of Europes most popular outdoor strategy game. Let's knock them out.

activity.Title: Treasure Hunting
activity.Intro: How good are you at reading and finding clues? Come and try our Treasure Hunting game and win an exciting prices in our century treasure.

activity.Title: Rope Climbing
activity.Intro: Strap and buckle that harness and climb that rope.

activity.Title: Three Legged Race
activity.Intro: A game of cooperation between partners as much as it is one of speed.

activity.Title: Chambok Waterfall Tour
activity.Intro: Join our Chambok water fall tour and experience the magnificent beauty of the fall as well as the native around.

activity.Title: Jungle Trekking
activity.Intro: Jungle treks can be taken throughout the year. In the green season when rain is plentiful the forest is awash with lush.

activity.Title: Half Day Sightseeing Tour
activity.Intro: We will show you around the Kirirom National Park, including king Sihanouk's royal palace ruins.
